Investigate Echo Ridge

Kill 10 Kobold Workers, then report back to Marshal McBride.
  •  
Kobold Worker slain (10)

Description

<name>, my scouts tell me that the kobold infestation is larger than we had thought. A group of kobold workers has camped near the Echo Ridge Mine to the north.

Go to the mine and remove them. We know there are at least 10. Kill them, see if there are more, then report back to me.

Progress

Have you been to the mines? Are you ready to report?

Completion

I don't like hearing of all these kobolds in our mine. No good can come of this. Here, take this as payment, and when you're ready, speak to me again. I would like you to go back to the mines one more time...

Gains

Upon completion of quests, get:
  • 250 Experience
  • 100 Reputation with Stormwind
